name: Forte City
description:
Game by Jonrador

This game has been made for the Game A Month February 2018 game jam. Join the character Piano on an exciting jog over the rooftops of downtown Forte City!

**--THIS GAME WAS DESIGNED WITH A CONTROLLER IN MIND--**

As such it feels best with a controller. The game may feel slightly off beat if using a keyboard, but its still possible to beat.

--CONTROLS--

A/ Cross/ Space - Jump/Select

B/Circle/Escape - Back (When Prompted)

Start/ Options/ Enter - Restart (When Prompted)

-----------------------------

Music: https://soundcloud.com/john-wolz-335136001/space5-forte-city-theme
